snippet: Despite the United Nations’ admission that it had played a role in an outbreak in Haiti, the decision by a three-judge panel precludes the organization from being sued....
abstract: Class-action lawsuit charging deaths of thousands of cholera victims in Haiti were due to presence of infected Nepalese United Nations peacekeepers falters after United States federal appeals panel rules UN cannot be sued in American courts.
lead_paragraph: Despite the United Nations’ admission that it had played a role in an outbreak in Haiti, the decision by a three-judge panel precludes the organization from being sued.

headline.main: U.S. Court Upholds United Nations’ Immunity in Cholera Suit
headline.print_headline: Panel Upholds U.N. Immunity in Cholera Suit
